LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Including Current Maturities
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsIn.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, including portion classified as current.

NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.label: Net Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.label: Net Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

OtherInventoryCapitalizedCosts.label: Other Inventory, Capitalized Costs, Gross
OtherInventoryCapitalizedCosts.description: Amount, before valuation and last-in first out (LIFO) reserves, of costs capitalized in inventory classified as other, expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromDividendsReceived.label: Proceeds from Dividends Received
ProceedsFromDividendsReceived.description: Dividends received on equity and other investments during the current period.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

StockholdersEquityNoteSpinoffTransaction.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Spinoff Transaction
StockholdersEquityNoteSpinoffTransaction.description: The change in equity as a result of a spin-off transaction (a regular or reverse spin-off) which is based on the recorded amounts.

UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.label: Undistributed Continuing Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Diluted
UndistributedContinuingOperationEarnings.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from continuing operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Decrease for Tax Withholding Obligation
AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.description: Amount of decrease to equity for grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.label: Net Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.label: Net Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarnin.label: Undistributed Discontinued Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Basic
UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarnin.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for basic earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarnin.label: Undistributed Discontinued Operation Earnings (Loss), Allocation to Participating Securities, Diluted
UndistributedDiscontinuedOperationEarnin.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) from discontinued operations allocated to participating securities for diluted earnings (loss) per share or per unit calculation under two-class method.

DebtAndEquitySecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Debt and Equity Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtAndEquitySecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

PaymentsForPostemploymentBenefits.label: Payments for Postemployment Benefits
PaymentsForPostemploymentBenefits.description: Cash outflows for payments of postemployment benefits (such as severance pay and health insurance benefits) recognized during the period. Postemployment benefits are benefits paid to employees after employment but before retirement.
